snippets:
[
    // Math mode
    {trigger: "/mk", replacement: "$$0,$", options: "tA"},
    {trigger: "/dm", replacement: "$$$0.$$", options: "twA"},
    {trigger: "disp", replacement: "\\displaystyle", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "beg", replacement: "\\begin{$0}\n$1\n\\end{$0}", options: "mA"},

    // Accumulation Symbols
    {trigger: "intf ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\int_{[[0]]}^{\\infty} ", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "intf ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\int_{[[0]]}^{\\infty} $0 d[[1]]$1", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "-fint ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\int_{-\\infty}^{[[0]]} ", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "-fint ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\int_{-\\infty}^{[[0]]} $0 d[[1]]$1", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "-fintf", replacement: "\\int_{-\\infty}^{\\infty} ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "-fintf ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\int_{-\\infty}^{\\infty} $0 d[[0]]$1", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "intR", replacement: "\\int_{\\mathbb{R}} ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "intR ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\int_{\\mathbb{R}} $0 d[[0]]$1", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "intRm ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\int_{\\mathbb{R}^{[[0]]}} ", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "intRm ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\int_{\\mathbb{R}^{[[0]]}} $0 d[[1]]$1", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "int ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\int_{[[0]]}^{[[1]]}", options: "rm", description:"gives an integral with specified bounds. int a b gives an integral from a to b."},
    {trigger: "int ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\int_{[[0]]}^{[[1]]} $0 d[[2]]$1", options: "rm", description:"Same as above but now with a variable"},
    {trigger: "int ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\int $0 d[[0]]$1", options: "rm", description:"Integral with just a variable"},
    {trigger: "intm ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\int_{[[0]]} $0 d[[1]]$1", options: "rm", description:"Integral with domain and variable"},
    {trigger: "01int", replacement: "\\int_{0}^{1} ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "01int ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\int_{0}^{1} $0 d[[0]]$1", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "sum ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)=([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\sum_{[[0]]=[[1]]}^{[[2]]} ", options: "rm", description: "gives a sum starting at a specified number, with a specified index, and ending at the specified number or variable. sum i=1 n would give a sum starting from i=1 up to n. Spaces separate the arguments."},
    {trigger: "sumf ([^\b_=\ \t\n\r\$]+)=([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\sum_{[[0]]=[[1]]}^{\\infty} ", options: "rm", description:"gives a series from a specified starting place with a specified index. sumf i 0 gives a sum from i=0 to infinity."},
    {trigger: "prd", replacement: "\\prod_{${0:i\\in I}} $1", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "prd([^\b_=\ \t\n\r\$]+)=([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\prod_{[[0]]=[[1]]}^{[[2]]}", options: "rm", description:"gives a product with specified index and bounds. prdi=1 n gives the product from i=1 up to n."},
    {trigger: "prdf ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)=([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\prod_{[[0]]=[[1]]}^{\\infty}", options: "rm", description:"gives infinite products with specified index and starting place."},
    {trigger: "/bcu", replacement: "\\bigcup", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/UU", replacement: "\\bigcup_{${0:i\\in I}}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bcu([^\b_=\ \t\n\r\$]+)=([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\bigcup_{[[0]]=[[1]]}^{[[2]]} ", options: "rm", description:"gives a big union with specified index and bounds."},
    {trigger: "bcuf ([^\b_=\ \t\n\r\$]+)=([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\bigcup_{[[0]]=[[1]]}^{\\infty} ", options: "rm", description:"gives an infinite union with specified index and starting place."},
    {trigger: "/bca", replacement: "\\bigcap_{${0:i\\in I}}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bca([^\b_=\ \t\n\r\$]+)=([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\bigcap_{[[0]]=[[1]]}^{[[2]]} ", options: "rm", description:"gives a big intersection with specified index and bounds."},
    {trigger: "bcaf ([^\b_=\ \t\n\r\$]+)=([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\bigcap_{[[0]]=[[1]]}^{\\infty} ", options: "rm", description:"gives an infinite intersection with specified index and starting place."},
    {trigger: "lim ([^\b_=\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\lim_{[[0]]\\to [[1]]} ", options: "rm", description:"gives a limit with specified index and the value or variable we are approaching, lim x a give the limit as x approaches a."},
    {trigger: "limf", replacement: "\\lim_{${0:n} \\to $1\\infty}$2", options: "mA", description: "limits to infinity with n as the default index variable. By pressing tab once, you could add a - sign for a limit to negative infinity."},
    {trigger: "lim([+-]) ([^\b_=\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\lim_{[[1]]\\to [[2]]^[[0]]} ", options: "rm", description:"Limits from above and below with specified bounds."},
    {trigger: "li*ms ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\limsup_{${0:x}\\to [[0]]} ", options: "rm", description:"Limit superior of a function with x as the default variable."},
    {trigger: "li*msf", replacement: "\\limsup_{${0:n}\\to \\infty} ", options: "rm", description:"Limit superior with n as the default variable."},
    {trigger: "li*mi ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\liminf_{${0:x}\\to [[0]]} ", options: "rm", description:"Limit inferior of a function with x as the default variable."},
    {trigger: "li*mif", replacement: "\\liminf_{${0:n}\\to \\infty} ", options: "rm", description:"Limit inferior with n as the default variable."},

    // Binary Operations
    {trigger: "//", replacement: "\\dfrac{$0}{$1}$2", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "/xx", replacement: "\\times ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cdt", replacement: "\\cdot", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "n[cC]r ([^\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "{[[0]] \\choose [[1]]}", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "laa", replacement: "\\land", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "/cov", replacement: "\\operatorname{cov}($0)", options: "mA"},

    // Binary Relations
    {trigger: "<->", replacement: "\\leftrightarrow ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "->", replacement: "\\to ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/ot", replacement: "\\leftarrow ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "!>", replacement: "\\mapsto ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "!_>", replacement: "\\longmapsto ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/inn", replacement: "\\in ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cc", replacement: "\\subseteq", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "ccc", replacement: "\\subset", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "===", replacement: "\\equiv ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ">=", replacement: "\\geqslant ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "<=", replacement: "\\leqslant ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ">>", replacement: "\\gg ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "<<", replacement: "\\ll ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "~~", replacement: "\\approx ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "~=", replacement: "\\approxeq ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "=~", replacement: "\\cong ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "~-", replacement: "\\simeq ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "prop", replacement: "\\propto ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "cx", replacement: "\\propto ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: ":=", replacement: "\\coloneqq ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "eqg", replacement: "\\underset{$0}{\\sim} ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "prcc", replacement: "\\preccurlyeq ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "|=", replacement: "\\models ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "|-", replacement: "\\vdash ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "/pal", replacement: "\\parallel", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "=>", replacement: "\\implies ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "=<", replacement: "\\impliedby ", options: "mA"},

    // Unary Operations
    {trigger: "sr", replacement: "^{2}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "cb", replacement: "^{3}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "rd", replacement: "^{$0}$1", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "/sq", replacement: "\\sqrt{ $0 }$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "sq ([^\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\sqrt[[[0]]]{ $0 }$1", options: "mr"},
    {trigger: "coj", replacement: "^{*}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "inv", replacement: "^{-1}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "inv ([^\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "^{-[[0]]}", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "par", replacement: "\\partial", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "par ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\dfrac{\\partial}{\\partial [[0]] $0} ", options: "rm"},
    {trigger: "der ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\dfrac{ d }{ d[[0]] } ", options: "rm", description: 'type der x for the first derivative w.r.t. x.'},
    {trigger: "dern ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\frac{ d^[[0]] }{ d${0:x}^[[0]] } ", options: "rm", description: 'type dern x for the n-th derivative w.r.t. x'},
    {trigger: "ddt", replacement: "\\frac{d}{dt} ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "ddx", replacement: "\\frac{d}{dx} ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "ddy", replacement: "\\frac{d}{dy} ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "ran", replacement: "\\operatorname{ran} ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "dom", replacement: "\\operatorname{dom} ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "rank", replacement: "\\operatorname{rank} ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "tcl", replacement: "\\operatorname{tc} ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "cof", replacement: "\\operatorname{cf} ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "ovrl", replacement: "\\overline{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "oovrl", replacement: "\\overline{\\overline{$0}}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "wht", replacement: "\\widehat{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "tld", replacement: "\\tilde{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "wld", replacement: "\\widetilde{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/Sq", replacement: "\\square", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/Di", replacement: "\\Diamond", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "nabl", replacement: "\\nabla ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/del", replacement: "\\nabla", options: "mA"},
//    {trigger: "trace", replacement: "\\mathrm{Tr}", options: "mA"},
//    {trigger: "re", replacement: "\\mathrm{Re}", options: "mA"},
//    {trigger: "im", replacement: "\\mathrm{Im}", options: "mA"},

    // Visual operations
    {trigger: "B", replacement: "\\underbrace{ ${VISUAL} }_{ $0 }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "U", replacement: "\\underset{ $0 }{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "O", replacement: "\\overset{ $0 }{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "C", replacement: "\\cancel{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "K", replacement: "\\cancelto{ $0 }{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "S", replacement: "\\sqrt{ ${VISUAL} }", options: "mA"},


    // Symbols
    {trigger: "||", replacement: "\\mid ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "/set", replacement: "\\{$0\\}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "ldt", replacement: "\\ldot", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "vdts", replacement: "\\vdots", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/ee", replacement: "\\exists ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/aa", replacement: "\\forall ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "vno", replacement: "\\varnothing ", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "inf(ty)*", replacement: "\\infty", options: "rm"},

    // Text
    {trigger: "/t", replacement: "$\\hspace{24pt}$", options: "t"},
    {trigger: "mac", replacement: "\\mathcal{$0}$1", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "mbb", replacement: "\\mathbb{$0}$1", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "mas", replacement: "\\mathscr{$0}$1", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "mak", replacement: "\\mathfrak{$0}$1", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "/tt", replacement: "\\text{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "mbf", replacement: "\\mathbf{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "tbf", replacement: "\\textbf{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/mL", replacement: "\\mathcal{L}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/mH", replacement: "\\mathcal{H}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bC", replacement: "\\mathbb{C}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bR", replacement: "\\mathbb{R}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "Rn", replacement: "\\mathbb{R}^{$0}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bZ", replacement: "\\mathbb{Z}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bN", replacement: "\\mathbb{N}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "bI", replacement: "\\mathbb{1}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/mA", replacement: "\\mathcal{A}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/BB", replacement: "\\mathbf{B}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/EE", replacement: "\\mathbf{E}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "_", replacement: "_{$0}$1", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "sts", replacement: "_\\text{$0}", options: "rmA"},
    {trigger: "rm", replacement: "\\mathrm{$0}$1", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "ovrs", replacement: "\\overset{$0}{$1}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "unds", replacement: "\\underset{$0}{$1} ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "undb", replacement: "\\underbrace{$0}_{$1} ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "opna", replacement: "\\operatorname{$0} ", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "opna ([^\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\operatorname{[[0]]} ", options: "rm"},

    // Unit vectors
    {trigger: ":i", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{i}}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: ":j", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{j}}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: ":k", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{k}}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: ":x", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{x}}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: ":y", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{y}}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: ":z", replacement: "\\hat{\\mathbf{z}}", options: "m"},

    // Environments
    {trigger: "pmat", replacement: "\\begin{pmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{pmatrix}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "bmat", replacement: "\\begin{bmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{bmatrix}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "Bmat", replacement: "\\begin{Bmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{Bmatrix}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "vmat", replacement: "\\begin{vmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{vmatrix}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "Vmat", replacement: "\\begin{Vmatrix}\n$0\n\\end{Vmatrix}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "cases", replacement: "\\begin{cases}$0 & $1\\end{cases}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "/align", replacement: "$$\n\\begin{align*}\n$0\n\\end{align*}\n$$", options: "tA"},
    {trigger: "array", replacement: "\\begin{array}\n$0\n\\end{array}", options: "m"},
    {trigger: "matrix", replacement: "\\begin{matrix}\n$0\n\\end{matrix}", options: "m"},

    // Brackets
    {trigger: "avg", replacement: "\\langle $0 \\rangle $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/norm", replacement: "\\lvert $0 \\rvert $1", options: "mA", priority: 1},
    {trigger: "(", replacement: "(${VISUAL})", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "[", replacement: "[${VISUAL}]", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "{", replacement: "{${VISUAL}}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "|", replacement: "|${VISUAL}|", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "(", replacement: "($0)$1", options: "mAw"},
    {trigger: "{", replacement: "{$0}$1", options: "mAw"},
    {trigger: "[", replacement: "[$0]$1", options: "mAw"},
    {trigger: "|", replacement: "|$0|$1", options: "mAw"},
    {trigger: "lr(", replacement: "\\left( $0 \\right) $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lr|", replacement: "\\left| $0 \\right| $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lr{", replacement: "\\left\\{ $0 \\right\\} $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lr[", replacement: "\\left[ $0 \\right] $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "lr<", replacement: "\\left< $0 \\right> $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/ceil", replacement: "\\left\\lceil $0 \\right\\rceil $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/floor", replacement: "\\left\\lfloor $0 \\right\\rfloor $1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/<>", replacement: "\\left\\langle $0 \\right\\rangle $1", options: "mA"},

    // Misc
    {trigger: "fams", replacement: "\\{$0\\}_{$1}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "/seq", replacement: "\\{${0:a_k}\\}_{${1:k=0}}^{${2:\\infty}}", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "seq([^\b_=\ \t\n\r\$]+)=([^\b_=\ \t\n\r\$]+) ([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\{$0\\}_{[[0]]=[[1]]}^{[[2]]}$1", options: "rm", description:"gives a sequence with specified bounds. seq 1 n turns into \\{<cursor here>\\}_{n=1}^{n} and seq \nu m-1 turns into \\{<cursor>\\}_{n=\nu}^{m-1}. The default n can be overwritten quickly with tab."},
    {trigger: "seqf ([^\b_=\ \t\n\r\$]+)=([^=\ \t\n\r\$]+)", replacement: "\\{$0\\}_{[[0]]=[[1]]}^{\\infty}$1", options: "rm", description:"gives a sequence as above but with the end place being \\infty."},

    // Greek letters
    {trigger: "@a", replacement: "\\alpha", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@A", replacement: "\\alpha", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@b", replacement: "\\beta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@B", replacement: "\\beta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@c", replacement: "\\chi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@C", replacement: "\\chi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@f", replacement: "\\phi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ":f", replacement: "\\varphi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@F", replacement: "\\Phi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@g", replacement: "\\gamma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@G", replacement: "\\Gamma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@d", replacement: "\\delta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@D", replacement: "\\Delta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@e", replacement: "\\epsilon", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@E", replacement: "\\epsilon", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ":e", replacement: "\\varepsilon", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: ":E", replacement: "\\varepsilon", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@z", replacement: "\\zeta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@Z", replacement: "\\zeta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@t", replacement: "\\theta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@T", replacement: "\\Theta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@k", replacement: "\\kappa", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@K", replacement: "\\kappa", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@l", replacement: "\\lambda", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@L", replacement: "\\Lambda", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@m", replacement: "\\mu", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@M", replacement: "\\mu", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@n", replacement: "\\nu", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@r", replacement: "\\rho", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@R", replacement: "\\rho", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@s", replacement: "\\sigma", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@S", replacement: "\\Sigma", options: "mA"},
//    {trigger: "ow", replacement: "\\omega", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@o", replacement: "\\omega", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@O", replacement: "\\Omega", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@h", replacement: "\\eta", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@i", replacement: "\\iota", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@x", replacement: "\\xi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@X", replacement: "\\Xi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@p", replacement: "\\psi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@P", replacement: "\\Psi", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@u", replacement: "\\upsilon", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "@U", replacement: "\\Upsilon", options: "mA"},
//    {trigger: "([^\\\\])(${GREEK}|${SYMBOL})", replacement: "[[0]]\\[[1]]", options: "rmA", description: "Add backslash before greek letters and symbols"},

    // Hebrew Letters
    {trigger: "#[nN]", replacement: "\\aleph", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "#[bB]", replacement: "\\beth", options: "mA"},

    // Misc.
    {trigger: "/usc", replacement: "U.S. Const. ${0:art}. $1, $\\S$2$", options: "t", description: "US Constitution citation"},
    {trigger: "/rdet", replacement: "``````ad-rem\ntitle:R Details\n\n```r\n$0\n```\n``````\n$1", options: "t", description: "R Details admonition"},
    {trigger: "DKL", replacement: "D_{\\mathrm{KL}}($0\\|)", options: "m"}
]
matrixShortcutsEnvNames: pmatrix, cases, align, bmatrix, Bmatrix, vmatrix, Vmatrix, array, matrix
autoEnlargeBracketsTriggers: sum, int, frac, prod, dfrac, bigcup, bigcap, coprod, bigoplus, bigtimes, bigvee, bigwedge
